description:
Lunalie el Blanca is the main character of the story. She is a knight and a royal bodyguard.
As an orphan, she was rumored to have been a demonspawn. However, eventually, she was adopted by Grandmaster Rahad, who raised her as a knight. After completing her apprenticeship, she was welcomed to the guard of her childhood friend, Princess Jill.
While accompanying her liege on a pilgrimage the party is attacked and the Princess is taken. For being the only survivors, she is blamed for the incident and tortured. After escaping from the torture chamber, she begins her search for the princess. She meets up with a slave merchant who promises to help her if she sells her virginity for two-thousand dinars. After being deflowered and paid, she returns to the merchant, only to be drugged by him and sold to slavery.
name: Lunalie el Blanca
